item.title: Harrowing details emerge after surfer killed by shark off popular beach
item.description: The surfer, who had a wife and young daughter, lost "a number of limbs" and his surfboard was broken in two, police said.

item.title: Palestinian gunmen kill six people in attack on Jerusalem bus stop
item.description: Israeli officials say two gunmen opened fire on a Jerusalem bus stop, killing six people and leaving seven others in serious condition.

item.title: Trial to begin today for man accused of Trump assassination attempt

item.title: Woman accused of killing her 2 kids, stuffing them in suitcases goes on trial
item.description: A trial opened in New Zealand of a South Korean woman accused of murdering her two children and leaving their bodies in suitcases for years before the...

item.title: After Trump's health funding cuts, states face tough budget decisions
